title: ABB joins 'critical' Statkraft system stability project
lead: ​Statkraft has unveiled the Lister Drive Greener Grid Park, which is to provide system stability as part of a contract with National Grid ESO.
author: Alice Grundy

title: Interoperability and petrol station EV charger rollout key recommendations of Bright Blue report
lead: A new report from thinktank Bright Blue has detailed the barriers to adoption of battery electric vehicles (BEVs) in the UK, making policy recommendations to address these.
author: Alice Grundy

title: Default price cap jumps £96 as wholesale energy prices rebound
lead: ​The default energy price cap is set to increase by £96 from 1 April 2021, returning to pre-pandemic levels to reflect rising wholesale prices.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: BEVs make strong start to 2021 with 54.4% increase in sales
lead: ​Battery electric vehicles (BEVs) are continuing to record strong sales as 2020 is celebrated as delivering the cleanest vehicles in history.
author: Alice Grundy

title: Dynamic Containment remains undersubscribed due to ‘pretty brutal’ requirements
lead: ​Four months into operation, Dynamic Containment is still undersubscribed according to new analysis from EnAppSys.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Heat pump market to almost double in 2021 as ‘essential’ domestic decarbonisation picks up speed
lead: ​Manufacturers have ordered nearly double the number of heat pumps currently on the shelves and in the warehouse in the UK to meet surging demand in 2021.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Juliet Davenport to step down as CEO as Good Energy looks to grow digital business
lead: Good Energy’s CEO Juliet Davenport is to step down from her role as the company looks to grow as a digital business.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Latest £11m round in government's Energy Entrepreneurs Fund announced
lead: ​Up to £11 million is up for grabs in the government’s latest round of the Energy Entrepreneurs Fund, looking to support new clean technologies.
author: Alice Grundy

title: EVBox launches real-time charging management platform for fleets
lead: ​EVBox has launched the Everon Business Portal, offering real-time insights into charging station health, charging patterns and energy consumption of electric vehicles (EVs).
author: Alice Grundy

title: Fulcrum partners Jumptech as it looks to expand its residential EV offering
lead: ​Energy infrastructure company Fulcrum has announced a new partnership with Jumptech to support its residential electric vehicle (EV) projects.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Investment minister dubs German interconnector ‘vital contribution to UK’s green ambitions’
lead: ​Minister for investment Gerry Grimstone has lauded the NeuConnect interconnector being developed between the UK and Germany as “a vital contribution to the UK’s green ambitions”.
author: Alice Grundy

title: RenewableUK announces appointment of Dan McGrail as new chief executive
lead: ​RenewableUK has revealed its next chief executive, with Dan McGrail to take up the post in May.
author: Alice Grundy

title: UKPN and SSEN look to pre-empt potential power cuts with new fault anticipation trial
lead: DNOs UK Power Networks (UKPN) and Scottish and Southern Electricity Networks (SSEN) are trialing a "futuristic" technology to prevent power cuts.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Government to extend On-Street Residential Chargepoint Scheme with £20m extra funding
lead: ​Funding for the On-Street Residential Chargepoint Scheme (ORCS) will continue into 2021/22, as local authorities are urged to take advantage of a new £20 million funding boost.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Ofgem increases price cap by almost £24 as 'Adjustment Allowance' is approved
lead: ​Ofgem is to adjust the default tariff price cap by almost £24 in response to growing bad debt as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Government tenders needed to support fivefold increase in public EV charger rollout
lead: ​The UK will need to install public electric vehicle (EV) chargepoints five times faster than the current rate over the next decade, with government tenders recommended to support this.
author: Alice Grundy

title: SSE on 'strong strategic footing' despite COVID-19 impact of around £200m
lead: ​SSE is continuing to expect the impact of COVID-19 to sit between £150 million and £250 million.
author: Alice Grundy

title: Octopus Energy appoints Ofwat CEO as director of regulation and economics
lead: Octopus Energy has announced the appointment of Ofwat’s Rachel Fletcher as director of regulation and economics.
author: Molly Lempriere

title: Dynamic Containment assets jump into action following French interconnector trip
lead: Battery storage was called into action following ​the IFA2 interconnector with France – which went live late last month​ – tripping on Friday (29 January).
author: Alice Grundy

title: Smart meter rollout reaches 10 million milestone
lead: ​The 10 millionth smart meter has been installed in Great Britain in a significant milestone for the technology.
author: Molly Lempriere
